info.title: TigerConnect User API
info.description: The user system for TigerConnect messaging platform.

get.summary: Get information about users using their user address encoding.
get.description: Get information about users using their user address encoding.

parameters.name: TT-X-Organization-Key
parameters.description: The organization for which to show the user's organization-bound fields (i.e. time_to_live, delete_on_read, distinguished_name).

200.description: 200 OK with a JSON response as described in response formats

token.description: Unique user token identifier for the user in TigerText

status.description: A status message string set by the user

display_name.description: Display name string which typically first name

avatar.description: Avatar image url, u201c u201c if no avatar is set

dnd.description: Boolean if the user is on do not disturb

dnd_text.description: Dnd message string when the user is on do not disturb

time_to_live.description: Time to live for useru2019s messages in minutes

delete_on_read.description: Boolean flag indicating messages should be deleted on read

distinguished_name.description: Distinguished name string, mainly used for LDAP purposes

phones.description: A list of the user phones.
